text: Rafael Devers is a Dominican third baseman for the Boston Red Sox. He was an All-Star winner in 2021 and 2022. The Boston Red Sox signed Devers as a free agent at 16 years old of August, 2013. Devers signed a $11.2 million dollar contract deal with the Boston Red Sox in 2022. title: Rafael Devers
